title: Dark Star Orianna vs Dark Star Khazix Skin Quality

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body:
Whomever is doing Dark Star {{champion:121}} , keep up the good work as for the designer working on Dark Star {{champion:61}} that skin is not currently worth 1350 and is far from "Epic" tier  

..remember now before you judge my point, Arcade skin line, Project skin line, Blood moon skin line and Star Guardian skin line are all 1350,  there is a lot of opportunity here, don't mess this up please..

replies.body:
Hiya, ILittle IMonster! Thanks for the feedback. :]

Just wanted to check in and see how you felt about the quality of DS Orianna now. Do you think that she still isn't up to the 1350 level of quality that you'd expect?

well I mean, I can't tell if this is sarcasm, lol but I'm gonna weigh in anyway lol, I just really thought she had A LOT of potential to be great and now those small tweaks make her overall design, Amazing!!

I really love the darkhole thing on her ULT really fits the DS theme, thank you for asking @Riot LoveStrut!

Definitely being bought now, no matter what lol

> [{quoted}](name=ILittle IMonster,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=tiWryOmu,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2017-04-21T19:21:40.194+0000)
>
> well I mean, I can't tell if this is sarcasm, lol but I'm gonna weigh in anyway lol, I just really thought she had A LOT of potential to be great and now those small tweaks make her overall design, Amazing!!
> 
> I really love the darkhole thing on her ULT really fits the DS theme, thank you for asking @Riot LoveStrut!
> 
> Definitely being bought now, no matter what lol

Ahh, sorry! It definitely wasn't sarcasm! I honestly wanted to check in because if you're thinking that it wasn't worth 1350, you're definitely not alone in that sentiment. :] I'm super happy to hear that you're loving the new tweaks though! Glad to hear that we're making the right improvements. 

Cool, thanks again for the honesty and feedback. Always helps. <3
Any chance of a tweaked VO?
Yeah, something similar to what they've done to skins like BC/Arclight Vel'Koz would be nice and would certainly bring the standard of the skin up to par with it's current price.

wow..


Stahp it right now or I might fall in love <3 <3 <3 <3

> [{quoted}](name=Riot LoveStrut,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=tiWryOmu,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2017-04-21T23:35:38.424+0000)
>
> Ahh, sorry! It definitely wasn't sarcasm! I honestly wanted to check in because if you're thinking that it wasn't worth 1350, you're definitely not alone in that sentiment. :] I'm super happy to hear that you're loving the new tweaks though! Glad to hear that we're making the right improvements. 
> 
> Cool, thanks again for the honesty and feedback. Always helps. <3

Have you been paying attention to DS Kha'Zix feedack thread on the PBE Boards? Some people seem unsatisfied with the skin and are asking for some tweaks and I've noticed you haven't said a word yet.

I find DS Orianna 1350 quality, easily. 1350 quality has a recall, a flashy model, and completely overhauled VFX, which applies completely to Orianna. I'm not sure why you think it's not up to this quality.
no reason to explain, look at both of them side by side if one has more then one isn't 1350 quality, simple.

I think that if you want to give a good critique, you should always explain your point, even if for you it's obvious. If you are taking the time to open a thread to express an opinion, take that little extra time to explain what you mean, so that the people at the other end can have a meaningful input.

That said, tweaks were made, so win for everyone ^^

> a good critique

is solely opinion, I was not speaking from a subjective standpoint or I wouldnt have been contacted by a Rioter, I was speaking objectively for the whole, you cant speak specifically because that is a preference on how EXACTLY you want the skin to look , color wise etc.. read what LoveStrut said,

> I honestly wanted to check in because if you're thinking that it wasn't worth 1350, _**you're definitely not alone in that sentiment. :]**_ (yes I left the smiley face in there)

Obviously they are seeing alot of negative feedback in general on DS Orianna, I just addressed it is all.

SEE I TOLD YOU, DS ORIANNA TWEAKS

Src: 
http://www.surrenderat20.net/2017/04/420-pbe-update.html?m=1

I find that there's a real reason why riot doesn't include her hideously plain legs in any of the splash or login theme art works.
I also think that for an ult that vacuums champions in shouldn't have an explosion VFX wave going out.

I completely aggree on the bland legs

as for the Ult its an implosion.. its basically a blackhole with the force of an explosion of a supernova i.e. black hole the force from said vacuuming/gravitational field. which would cause a residual shockwave.. as the ult name implies

> [{quoted}](name=ILittle IMonster,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=tiWryOmu,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2017-04-23T01:06:38.194+0000)
>
> I completely aggree on the bland legs
> 
> as for the Ult its an implosion.. its basically a blackhole with the force of an explosion of a supernova i.e. black hole the force from said vacuuming/gravitational field. which would cause a residual shockwave.. as the ult name implies

Id be fine with them removing her legs all together they look that bad to me.
A cosmic entity that destroys planets when she pleases has no need for legs, she floats around space anyway

> [{quoted}](name=ILittle IMonster,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=tiWryOmu,comment-id=0003000000000000,timestamp=2017-04-23T02:47:39.229+0000)
>
> A cosmic entity that destroys planets when she pleases has no need for legs, she floats around space anyway

Agreed! RIOT PLEASE!!!!!!! it would prob look sooo awesome

but since they are there.. a gold accent like starting at the top of the shin and going down to the foot could look nice , or they could pull an {{champion:136}} transparent tail look

Src : https://gyazo.com/c633dd2ca4fcaa8f25819871abea1680
